data_table.description: Retinal Examination Form, Visit 5. Participants with or without atherosclerosis and cardiovascular disease and involved in the "Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) Cohort" project.

variable.name: SUBJECT_ID
variable.description: ARIC subject ID [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX0C
variable.description: Administrative Information. Eye photographed at visit 3 [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX1
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q1. Periodic eye examinations [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX2
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q2. When was the last time you saw a doctor, ophthalmologist, or eye specialist concerning your vision? [Retinal Examination Form, REX]
variable.value: At least 1 year but less than 2 years
At least 2 years but less than 3 years

variable.name: REX3
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q3. Doctor diagnosed diabetes [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX3A
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q3a. Has a doctor ever told you that you have eye problems as a result of diabetes? [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX3B
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q3b. Has a doctor ever told you that you have eye problems as a result of diabetes? Which eye or eyes were affected? [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX3C
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q3c. Received treatment for diabetic retinopathy [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX3D
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q3d. Diabetic retinopathy treatment on which eye [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX4
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q4. Doctor diagnosed glaucoma [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX4A
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q4a. Glaucoma affected which eye [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX5
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q5. Doctor diagnosed macular degeneration [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX5A
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q5a. Macular degeneration affected which eye [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX5B
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q5b. Received treatment for macular degeneration [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX5C
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q5c. Macular degeneration treatment on which eye [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX6
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q6. Doctor diagnosed cataracts [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX6A
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q6a. Cataracts affected which eye [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX6B
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q6b. Received eye surgery for cataracts [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX6C
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q6c. Have you ever had eye surgery because of cataracts? On which eye or eyes?[Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX7
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q7. Has a doctor ever told you that you have blockage of an artery or vein in one or both of your eyes? [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX7A
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q7a. Artery or vein blockage affected which eye [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX7B
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q7b. Received laser treatments on eyes for artery or vein blockage [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX7C
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q7c. Artery or vein blockage treatment on which eye [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX8
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q8. Received eye surgery for other condition [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX8B
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q8b. Have you ever had eye surgery for another condition? On which eye or eyes? [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX9
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q9. Received laser treatment on your eyes for other condition [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX9A
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q9a. Description of other condition requiring laser treatment [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX9B
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q9b. Other condition requiring laser treatment affected which eye [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX10
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q1. Received doctor care for trauma or injury to eye [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX10B
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q10b. Trauma or injury requiring doctor care affected which eye [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX11
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q11. Subject description of eyesight [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX11A
variable.description: A. Ophthalmic History. Q11a. When did eyesight become poor [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX12
variable.description: B. Photographic Section. Q12. Which eye(s) were photographed? [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX13
variable.description: B. Photographic Section. Q13. Right eye flash setting [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX14
variable.description: B. Photographic Section. Q14. Right eye pupil measurement [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX15
variable.description: B. Photographic Section. Q15. Right eye field 1 taken [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX16
variable.description: B. Photographic Section. Q16. Right eye field 2 taken [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX17
variable.description: B. Photographic Section. Q17. Left eye flash setting [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX18
variable.description: B. Photographic Section. Q18. Left eye pupil measurement [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX19
variable.description: B. Photographic Section. Q19. Left eye field 1 taken [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX20
variable.description: B. Photographic Section. Q20. Left eye field 2 taken [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX21
variable.description: B. Photographic Section. Q21. Reason neither eye photographed [Retinal Examination Form, REX]

variable.name: REX0AY
variable.description: Administrative Information. Q0a. Year of completion date [Retinal Examination Form, REX]
